name: Tsundoku
description:
"Tsundoku" is Japanese term for the practice of letting books and other reading material pile up un-read. In this game, books will appear over the tabletop, and float back and forth across the screen. Tap the screen or left-click with the mouse to make them drop. Don't let them fall off the table!

screen-touch or mouse-click

Software: Unity and Affinity Designer
